definitions.definition: A cannon that combines certain characteristics of field guns and mortars , delivering projectiles with medium velocities , usually with relatively high trajectories ; normally a cannon with a tube length of 20 to 30 calibers .

main_definition: A cannon that combines certain characteristics of field guns and mortars , delivering projectiles with medium velocities , usually with relatively high trajectories ; normally a cannon with a tube length of 20 to 30 calibers .
secondary_definitions: ( sports , rugby , ice hockey ) A powerfully hit shot .
